text_block_list.text:
Winning Ticket has been waiting her whole life for today. This is her 
chance to accomplish her dream of winning the Derby.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Exhale…

Hand on her chest, she lets out a deep breath. She slowly opens her 
eyes and gazes at the turf at the end of the tunnel.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Even standing behind her, I can tell she's never been so focused.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Yeah, she's normally making a racket screaming our ears off.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Oooh… Even I'm getting nervous…

All of Team Sirius is waiting with bated breath as they watch Winning 
Ticket's valiant figure from afar. But the stoic competitor breaks the 
silence.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Nnngh! Hrrrgh! It's no good, I'm all itchy!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: I get all tense when I focus! And when I get tense, I get itchy!
That's the Tickezo I know.
That's the Tickezo I know.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
If you're really that itchy, we can use our special trick to give you a 
decent send off.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Special trick?

Mejiro McQueen gives the signal to the others, and they all raise their 
open palms up behind Winning Ticket's back.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: O-one, two… three!

text_block_list.name: Everyone
text_block_list.text: Good luck!
Whack!
All at once, they slap Winning Ticket on the back.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Hyaaah! That was hard!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: You're good to go! Now, have the best Derby ever, Ticket!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: You know I will! I'm gonna run the race of my life!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Until now, the Derby has been something exciting that I aspired to. 
But this time, I'm actually in it…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: I've got my rivals, my team, and my trainer with me… Now this is my Derby!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeah! Just watch me!
